import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Dropdown} from "../../../components/buttons/Dropdown"; import {SideOverlay} from "./SideOverlay" /* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ const genres = [ { name: 'Afro', description: 'desc', isActive: true, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { name: 'House', description: 'desc', isActive: false, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { name: 'Tech', description: 'desc', isActive: true, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { name: 'Deep', description: 'desc', isActive: false, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517841905240-472988babdf9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, ] const options1 = [ { name: "Edit" }, { name: "Activate" }, { name: "Delete" } ] const options2 = [ { name: "Edit" }, { name: "Deactivate" }, { name: "Delete" } ] export const GenresPage = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [formType, setFormType] = useState(true) const handleAdd = () =>{ setOpen(true) setFormType(true) } const handleOptions = (e, button) =>{ setOpen(true) setFormType(false) } return ( <>

Genres

desc

{genres.map((genre) => ( ))}
Name Status Options
{genre.name}
{genre.description}
 {genre.isActive ? ( Active ): ( Not Active )} Edit } handler={handleOptions}/>
) }
